It can only be called by the contract owner."},"buyPositionTokensOnBehalfAtomic(uint128,address,address,uint256,uint128,uint128,bytes,bytes)":{"notice":"This function allows the CLOB to initiate the buying of YES and NO position tokens atomically on behalf of two accounts \"yes\" and \"no\". documentation.text:
Smart contract contructor to initialize the PredictionMarket with the specified collateral token.
@param _collateralToken The address of the ERC20 token to be used as collateral (e.g., USDC).
